citeinfo.title: Bering Strait; The Regional Physical Oceanography

abstract.p: A description of geographic features, water masses, currents and numerical considerations of Bering Strait and the neighboring Chukchi and Bering Seas.
[Reference:Coachman, L.K. and K. Aagaard, and R.B. Tripp. 1975. Bering Strait; The Regional Physical Oceanography. University of Washington Press. 172 pp.] ISBN: 0-295-95442-6
This volume may be found at many university libraries.

descript.purpose: To report the physical oceanography of the Bering Strait.

idinfo.accconst: Check with your local library for book.
